record.properties: Top = 336 Left = 244 Width = 843 Height = 348 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"
Top = 0 Left = 0 DoCreate = .T. Caption = "ABOUT" uniqueid = 596C3CFDDB4E4182B8014ADF17C15A6E Name = "MR_ABOUT" tmrSql.Name = "tmrSql"
FontName = "Consolas" FontSize = 8 Anchor = 15 Height = 456 Left = 12 ReadOnly = .T. TabIndex = 9 Top = 36 Width = 936 ZOrderSet = 0 Value = IntegralHeight = .F. islog = .T. Name = "edtlog"
Top = 0 Left = 12 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_clear_black_18dp.png Caption = "ZAP" ToolTipText = "DANGER ZONE: ZAPS TABLES WITH NO CONFIRMATION" Name = "_tbcommand1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click local msg, result
m.msg = 'THIS PROCESS WILL DELETE ALL DATA. CLOSE ALL OPEN TABS NOW.' + 0H0D0A0D0A
m.msg = m.msg + 'DELETE ALL DATA?'
m.result = messagebox(M.msg, 4 + 64 + 256, 'MODROBOT')
if m.result # 6
return
endif
close tables all
_logwrite('ZAP/PACK START')
_logwrite('ZAP MR_ADDONS')
use MR_ADDONS exclusive
zap
_logwrite('ZAP MR_ADDONS_API ')
use MR_ADDONS_API exclusive
zap
_logwrite('PACK MR_ADDONS_EXC ')
use MR_ADDONS_EXC exclusive
pack
_logwrite('PACK MR_BATCH ')
use MR_BATCH exclusive
pack
_logwrite('ZAP MR_BLACKLIST ')
use MR_BLACKLIST exclusive
zap
_logwrite('PACK MR_CATEGORIES ')
use MR_CATEGORIES exclusive
pack
_logwrite('ZAP MR_DEPENDENCIES ')
use MR_DEPENDENCIES exclusive
zap
_logwrite('ZAP MR_FILES ')
use MR_FILES exclusive
zap
_logwrite('ZAP MR_FILEVERSIONS ')
use MR_FILEVERSIONS exclusive
zap
_logwrite('ZAP MR_INSTANCES ')
use MR_INSTANCES exclusive
zap
_logwrite('ZAP MR_LOG ')
use MR_LOG exclusive
zap
_logwrite('ZAP MR_MODIDS ')
use MR_MODIDS exclusive
zap
_logwrite('ZAP MR_MODS ')
use MR_MODS exclusive
zap
_logwrite('ZAP MR_PASTES ')
use MR_PASTES exclusive
zap
use
alter table MR_LOG alter column LID I autoinc nextvalue 1
use
_apideletefile(addbs(thisform.apppath) + 'DATA\MR_LOG.BAK')
_logwrite('ZAP/PACK END')
_logwrite('REINDEX TABLES START')
_indextables()
_logwrite('REINDEX TABLES END')
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 864 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_info_black_18dp.png Caption = "ABOUT" ToolTipText = "LIST MODROBO INFO" tbalign = 2 Name = "_tbcommand2"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click local atables[1], lnx, ncount, olbl
thisform.edtlog.logclear()
m.items = agetfileversion(aitems, application.servername)
_logwrite('EXECUTABLE FILE: ' + application.servername)
_logwrite('Comments: ' + m.aitems(1)) _logwrite('Company Name: ' + m.aitems(2)) _logwrite('File Description: ' + m.aitems(3)) _logwrite('File Version: ' + m.aitems(4)) _logwrite('Internal Name: ' + m.aitems(5)) _logwrite('Legal Copyright: ' + m.aitems(6)) _logwrite('Legal Trademarks: ' + m.aitems(7)) _logwrite('Original File Name: ' + m.aitems(8)) _logwrite('Private Build: ' + m.aitems(9)) _logwrite('Product Name: ' + m.aitems(10)) _logwrite('Product Version: ' + m.aitems(11)) _logwrite('Special Build: ' + m.aitems(12)) _logwrite('OLE Self Registration: ' + m.aitems(13)) _logwrite('Language: ' + m.aitems(14)) _logwrite('Translation Code: ' + m.aitems(15))
_logwrite('EXTERNAL CONFIG FILE: ' + sys(2019, 1)) _logwrite('INTERNAL CONFIG FILE: ' + sys(2019, 2)) _logwrite('START FOLDER: ' + sys(2004)) _logwrite('TEMP PATH: ' + sys(2023))
m.ncount = adir(adbfs, thisform.apppath + 'data\mr_*.dbf')
for m.lnx = 1 to m.ncount
use m.adbfs[m.lnx, 1] again in 0 shared
endfor
m.ncount = aused(atables)
= asort(m.atables)
for m.lnx = 1 to m.ncount
_logwrite(m.atables[m.lnx, 1] + ': ' + transform(reccount(m.atables[m.lnx, 1])),'RECORDS')
use in m.atables[m.lnx]
endfor
close tables all
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 624 Height = 28 Width = 72 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_open_in_new_black_18dp.png Caption = "DISCORD" ToolTipText = "MODROBOT WIKI" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tblinkhome"

Top = 0 Left = 696 Height = 28 Width = 84 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_open_in_new_black_18dp.png Caption = "ISSUES" ToolTipText = "MODROBOT GITHUB ISSUES" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tblinkfile1"

Top = 0 Left = 780 Height = 28 Width = 84 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_open_in_new_black_18dp.png Caption = "RELEASES" ToolTipText = "MODROBOT RELEASES" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand3"

Top = 0 Left = 552 Height = 28 Width = 72 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_open_in_new_black_18dp.png Caption = "WIKI" ToolTipText = "MODROBOT WIKI" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand5"
Top = 0 Left = 108 Height = 28 Width = 86 Caption = "REINDEX" ToolTipText = "RECREATES TABLES INDEXES. CLOSE ALL OTHER OPEN TABS." Name = "_tbcommand4"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click m.msg = 'THIS WILL REGENERATE AL INDEXES, PLEASE CLOSE ALL OPEN TABS.' + 0h0d0a0d0a
m.msg = m.msg + 'REINDEX?'
m.result = messagebox(m.msg, 4+64+256, 'MODROBOT')
if m.result # 6
return
endif
close tables all
_logwrite('REINDEX TABLES START')
_indextables()
_logwrite('REINDEX TABLES END')
ENDPROC
